document_data.name: Marco Wildfeet
document_data.mainbody: '''Marco Wildfeet''' was the unofficial leader of [[Soravia]] in [[Damara]] in [[1359 DR]].
document_data.History: Marco led his people in the opposition to [[Zhengyi]].
document_data.Activities: Marco was the leader of the [[Soravian Talebringers]].
document_data.Personality: Marco wanted to do his duty to his people and afterward go back into the shadows. He planned to name [[Olwen Forest-Friend]] as the new Duke of Soravia. He was a humble man who did not like being at the center of attention.
